General.Name: Insumos Agroquimicos SA
General.Description: Insumos Agroquímicos S.A. engages in the commercialization of agrochemical products in Argentina. It offers herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, adjuvants, plant nutrition products, and growth regulators, as well as environmental formulations. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Av. Santa Fe 1731, Buenos Aires, Argentina, 1060
